title: Pastor's Wife (Pauletta Burleson)
description:
A pastor’s wife is gunned down in the couple’s driveway. Their relationship, their church and even family, start to intermingle in ways no one expected.

 

For episode information and photos, please visit https://anatomyofmurder.com/.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
